no.ovitas.compass2.kb.store.service
Interface TopicExpansionManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
TopicExpansionManagerImpl, TopicExpansionManagerJPA
public interface TopicExpansionManager

Manager service that expands topics related to a specified base topic.

Author:
Csaba Daniel

Method Summary
 List<TopicResult> expandList(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
          Expand the specified base topics into a list of topic results ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic.
 List<TopicResultNode> expandTree(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
          Expand the specified base topics into a list of topics result nodes ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic.
 void setDirectionFilter(RelationDirection direction)
          Set the relation direction filter to apply during expansion.
 void setMaxHops(int maxHops)
          Set the maximum number of hops to expand from the base topic.
 void setMaxResults(int maxResults)
          Set the maximum number of results to expand.
 void setMinWeight(double minWeight)
          Set the minimum total weight to expand.
 void setScopeFilter(Collection<Scope> allowedScopes)
          Set the scope filter to apply on names of the topics appear in the result.
 

Method Detail

setMaxHops

void setMaxHops(int maxHops)
Set the maximum number of hops to expand from the base topic.

Parameters:
maxHops - the maximum number of hops to expand

setMinWeight

void setMinWeight(double minWeight)
Set the minimum total weight to expand.

Parameters:
minWeight - the minimum total weight to expand

setMaxResults

void setMaxResults(int maxResults)
Set the maximum number of results to expand.

Parameters:
maxResults - the maximum number of results

setScopeFilter

void setScopeFilter(Collection<Scope> allowedScopes)
Set the scope filter to apply on names of the topics appear in the result. Every name under a scope that is not allowed will be eliminated during the expansion.

To reset this filter, set it to null.

Parameters:
allowedScopes - collection of scopes those are allowed

setDirectionFilter

void setDirectionFilter(RelationDirection direction)
Set the relation direction filter to apply during expansion. Relations will be expanded only in the specified direction.

To reset this filter, set it to null.

Parameters:
direction -

expandList

List<TopicResult> expandList(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
Expand the specified base topics into a list of topic results ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic. The result contains the base topic results and all the related topic results within the specified criteria.

Parameters:
baseTopic - the base topic to start the search from
Returns:
a list of expanded topic results, including the base topic results

expandTree

List<TopicResultNode> expandTree(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
Expand the specified base topics into a list of topics result nodes ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic. The result contains the base topics result nodes and all the related topic result nodes within the specified criteria.

Parameters:
baseTopics - the base topic to start the search from
Returns:
a list of expanded topic nodes, including the base topic nodes
